meanings.def: the first public appearance of a performer or sports player
examples: He will make his debut for the first team this week.
She’s making her New York debut at Carnegie Hall.

meanings.def: (of a performer or show) to make a first public appearance
examples: The ballet will debut next month in New York.

meanings.def: to be presented to the market for the first time; to present a new product or advertising campaign to the market
examples: The model is expected to debut at $19 000.
They will debut the products at the trade show.
The market debuted its ‘Get Fresh’ campaign last fall.
They have promised to debut the software by the end of the year.
